name: MSCRMImportCMData
description: Import data exported using Configuration Migration Tool into a CRM instance
author: Wael Hamze
helpMarkDown: More information on Configuration Migration Tools can be found [here](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/power-platform/admin/manage-configuration-data)

inputs.name: dataFile
inputs.label: Data File
inputs.helpMarkDown: The absolute path to exported data zip file

inputs.name: concurrentThreads
inputs.label: Concurrent Threads
inputs.helpMarkDown: The number of concurrent threads to use during import

inputs.name: userMapFile
inputs.label: User Map File
inputs.helpMarkDown: The user mapping xml file for mapping users during import (on-premise)

inputs.name: enabledBatchMode
inputs.label: Enabled Batch Mode
inputs.helpMarkDown: Instructs CMT to import into CDS using batches (default size of 600 records).  Note this does work in conjunction with multiple connections,  thus 2 connections creates 2 batches of 600 records.

inputs.name: batchSize
inputs.label: Batch Size
inputs.helpMarkDown: Allows you to override the default batch size.

inputs.name: crmConnectionTimeout
inputs.label: Connection Timeout
inputs.helpMarkDown: The Crm connection timeout in minutes

inputs.name: logsDirectory
inputs.label: Logs Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: The absolute path to the directory on agent server where logs will be placed. By default this will be $env:System_DefaultWorkingDirectory
